PerfectNetExp.abs: untrue 有径向振摆的, untrustworthiness 反信用, untrue 非真的

list.abs: none of us could persuade him out of lending his money to that untrustworthy man .我们谁都不能说服他不要借钱给那个不可靠的人。
Lacking a sense of responsibility ; unreliable or untrustworthy ., 不可靠的缺乏责任心 ; 不可靠或不值得信赖的.
we discovered him to be quite untrustworthy ., 我们发现他很不可信赖.
That man is absolutely untrustworthy ., 那个人绝对不可靠.

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of not deserving trust or confidence
